features: Health Monitoring: Imzuc smart watch can automatically monitor your real-time heart rate and manually measure SpO2 oxygen saturation. The smartwatches also track your sleep status and analyzes the sleep quality to lead a better sleeping habit. During exercise, the smartwatch automatically records daily steps, distance, calories burned, active minutes.

Mutiple Sport Modes with 5ATM Waterproof: Our fitness watch is equipped with 14 sports modes such as yoga, walking, ect, The smartwatch also tracks the outdoor workout route if connected with smartphone's GPS. Imzuc watch is designed with 5ATM waterproof rating ( 50 meters waterproof ), so you can enjoy swimming or sweating out without any worries.

Get Reminders on Watch: After connected, the smart watches can receive notifications for SMS and App. You won't miss important messages from your lover/friends. Also, Imzuc watch has a sedentary alert function and you can create reminders for drinking water, meetings, appointments and more in the alarm settings, making daily life and workout more concise and intelligent.

Personalized Watch Dials with More Functions: The fitness watch for women comes with 100+ In-App theme dials or set up your photos as watch faces, allow to create personalized style. Also, the sports watch supports music control, view the local weather, phone search function, stopwatch and more, giving more convenience and fun to your life.

Long Battery Life and Compatibility: Imzuc sports watch lasts for up to 7-10 days of continuous use or 30 days on standby after being 2-hour fully charged. Imzuc fitness tracker is compatible with most iOS 10.0 or Android OS 5.0 or higher smart phones (Not for tablets or computers).

Gentle Reminders for You: Please do not wear the smart watch too tightly to prevent excessive friction that may cause skin abrasion. Give your watch a break after prolonged use. The watch cannot make calls or reply text.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Battery life is awesome!!
reviews.reviewText: Have owned several smart watches in the last couple years. Battery always seem to die in a day or 2. This one lasts weeks and can connect to an app for all the fun stuff. Great feel, function, and style.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cheap alternative to Apple watch
reviews.reviewText: I had an apple watch with my iphone and really enjoyed it. Since I recently switched to a Samsung s23, I needed a new watch that was compatible, but I wanted something more affordable.For the price I am very satisfied several days in.Pros:Very inexpensive for the level of functionalityNice size. Not too big or smallNice variety of digital watch "faces" to choose fromSeems very accurate compared to my much more expensive apple watchImpressive battery life (I haven't charged it for several days and I'm at still over 80%)Cons:DOES NOT MAKE / RECEIVE CALLS. Just alerts you that a call is coming in and you have to answer on your phone. If that feature is important to you, this isn't your watch.Also can't reply to messages via the watch itself - need to use phoneCan't read entire text messages on watchCan't change the bandIf you just want health data and alerts to tell you to check your phone for messages and calls, this watch is an absolute steal and I'd totally recommend. If you want to be able to do most of what you can do on your phone also on the watch, this probably won't meet your expectations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really like this smart watch. It's easy to use, and it is soft not bulky feeling on your wrist. Th battery works long time b4 you need to charge it. Which is another thing I love, it's magnetic and no more wear out cables! You will love this

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Battery last for a long time
reviews.reviewText: I bought this watch for my husband for Christmas. He used to have an Apple Watch but it didn’t hold a charge any longer. He really just wanted some thing that would track his steps. He absolutely loves this watch. He says it does everything the Apple Watch can do for the most part. The best thing about it is the battery lasts for close to five days without being recharged. He has told me every day it was the best purchase and you can’t beat the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not what I expected
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The battery only lasts about a day and a half. Disconnects from my phone constantly. Might have just gotten a bad one but I’m returning this one. It is a good size not too big or small and easy to use just doesn’t stay charged or connected

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Watch For The Small Price
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice decent watch for the small price, this watch comes with very decent features for a basic watch and has a very nice feel and watch interface, this watch runs decently and the battery is pretty decent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Inaccurate reading HR and calories count, and does not recor my sleep during the day either.
reviews.reviewText: Inaccurate reading i noticed right away that calorie counts were not matching with treadmill when machine sai 190 the watch will read 91. The alerts stop coming trough only randomly and my sleeping was not accurate either is no way i was only sleepin 2 hours at night sometimes i work night shift and does not record my sleep during the day either. I can said the watch looks very nice many people thought was an apple watch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My son loves this watch especially for the step tracker and tracking his sleep.
